channel.title: [PI] Drop party command
channel.description:
Im looking for a command where, say I type ::ri(random items), i want it to fill my inventory with random items from a list that i put in the source. Ex. ::ri, fills my inventory with Morrigans items, PVP armors, Chaotics, and other things.
If somone could make one, ide be more than happy to +rep.
Thanks :)

item.title: [PI] Drop party command
item.dc:creator: @kronixz kronikz
item.description:
@kronixz wrote:

[quote=“imsuperman05, post:8, topic:418806”]nubs.

if(playerCommand.startsWith("dropparty")) { c.sendMessage("BLAH!"); c.getItems().addItem(c.randomItems(), 1 /* + Misc.random(5)*/);

client.java…

public int Items[] = { 4151, 6570, 4151, 11694}; public int randomItems() { return Items[(int) (Math.random() * Items.length)]; } [/quote]
yourz meh hiro

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Drop party command
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

nubs.

if(playerCommand.startsWith("dropparty")) { c.sendMessage("BLAH!"); c.getItems().addItem(c.randomItems(), 1 /* + Misc.random(5)*/);

client.java…

	public int Items[] = { 4151, 6570, 4151, 11694};
	public int randomItems() {
		return Items[(int) (Math.random() * Items.length)];
	}

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Drop party command
item.dc:creator: @Pblord7 Pblord7
item.description:
@Pblord7 wrote:

[quote=“baddy351, post:2, topic:418806”]Can’t rep. This is actually a fairly hard command to make. What you have to do is select alot of items (like 100) then use like Math.random()*100);
So that way it will choose at random. thats all. Also, i suggest a loop…[/quote]
I could make this in about 30 seconds from scratch

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Drop party command
item.dc:creator: @R3minice R3minice
item.description:
@R3minice wrote:

Is this the way you guys would do it?

if (c.freeSlots() > 0) { for (int i = 0; i < items.length; i++) { c.addItem(items[i], 1); }
Obviously this is only part of the command.

Read full topic
